sys_remote_update_set.description: OCIO Service Request Theme for the Service Portal
sys_remote_update_set.name: OCIO SR Theme

sys_update_xml.name: sp_css_ecf5927bdbd61300f72fe04a489619f9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_css"><sp_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><css>.navbar-brand img {
  max-height: 40px !important;
}
.navbar {
  padding: 0 1em;
}
.ocio-home-banner {
  padding: 8em 0;
  background-position: top center !important;
}
.ocio-home-banner .btn, .ocio-home-banner input {
  height: 3em;
  line-height: 2.8;
  font-size: 18px;
  padding: 0 1em;
  box-shadow: 5px 10px 20px #80808026;
}
input:focus {
  border: 1px solid #003366;
}
h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, p.ocio-subheading {
  color: #003366
}
p.ocio-subheading {
  font-size: 18px;
  margin-bottom: 2em;
}
h1 {
      margin-bottom: 0.5em;
}
.ocio-home-content {
  margin-top: -7em;
}
.panel-primary {
  border: none;
  box-shadow: 5px 10px 20px #80808026;
}
.panel-body {
  border: 1px solid #e8e8e8;
  padding: 2em;
}
.item-short-desc {
  margin-bottom: 1em;
}
.ocio-page-header h2 {
  margin-bottom: 1em;
    margin-top: 1.5em;
}
.number-icon {
  display: block;
  margin: 0;
  float: left;
    margin-right: 0.2em;
    vertical-align: middle;
}
.number-heading {
  margin-top: 0.5em;
}
.number-heading ~ .number-heading {
  padding-top: 0.5em;
}
.number-content {
  overflow:hidden;
  margin-bottom: 2em;
}</css><name>ocioSR.css</name><sys_class_name>sp_css</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-01 21:21:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>ecf5927bdbd61300f72fe04a489619f9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ocioSR.css</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_css_ecf5927bdbd61300f72fe04a489619f9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-01 21:22:03</sys_updated_on></sp_css></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_theme_c9139af7dbd61300f72fe04a489619e2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_theme"><sp_theme action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><css_variables>$sp-logo-margin-x: 		15px !default;
$sp-tagline-color:		$text-color !default;
$navbar-inverse-bg: 	#3a3f51 !default;
$navbar-inverse-link-color: #bdc0c4 !default;
$navbar-inverse-link-hover-color: #ffffff !default;
$body-bg: 				#f0f3f4 !default;
$dropdown-link-disabled-color: #ccc;</css_variables><footer/><footer_fixed>false</footer_fixed><header display_value="OCIO SR Header">320156bfdb9213003d1dd001cf9619ca</header><name>OCIO SR Theme</name><navbar_fixed>true</navbar_fixed><sys_class_name>sp_theme</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-01 21:11:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>c9139af7dbd61300f72fe04a489619e2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO SR Theme</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_theme_c9139af7dbd61300f72fe04a489619e2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-01 21:23:55</sys_updated_on></sp_theme></record_update>
